thread.title: Harvest Week Returns to Hotel Belleclaire for Family-Friendly Fun on Manhattan’s Upper West Side
thread.title_full: Harvest Week Returns to Hotel Belleclaire for Family-Friendly Fun on Manhattan’s Upper West Side

author: Robert Holmes, General Manager
title: Harvest Week Returns to Hotel Belleclaire for Family-Friendly Fun on Manhattan’s Upper West Side
text:
Created as a celebration of the fall season, Harvest Week will feature a series of seasonally themed treats and events for guests of all ages, including:
 Pumpkin painting contests Gourmet desserts and baked goods provided by Sweetery NYC Seasonal sweets including candy corn and caramel apples Halloween costume contest
Guests and participants are encouraged to share photos of their costumes on Twitter and Facebook during the contest on October 31, 2015 using the hashtag #HBHalloween2015 for a chance to complimentary deluxe accommodations for one night’s stay at Hotel Belleclaire in New York City.
“Harvest Week is a favorite of our guests and staff,“ said Robert Holmes, General Manager. “It’s the perfect time to be in New York City, with the colors changing and the upcoming fall holidays creating a sense of unity and home. We want to celebrate that excitement and get into the spirit of the season, what better way to do that than by enjoying sweets and treats together?”
Harvest Week events will take place at the Hotel Belleclaire lobby and are open to guests staying at the hotel, as well as to the general public.
About Hotel Belleclaire
Hotel Belleclaire is a member of Triumph Hotel Group, a collection of sophisticated boutique hotels in New York City. The Upper West Side hotel is located in a landmark building designed by Emery Roth in 1903. Hotel Belleclaire boasts 240 guest rooms and suites with an array of deluxe amenities, such as complimentary wireless internet, C.O. Bigelow amenities, luxurious Frette linens, flat screen HDTV’s, and sleek laminate-wood floors. The hotel also offers morning coffee and tea service, 24-hour fitness center access and premier concierge services. Learn more at HotelBelleclaire.com.
